note:
Officially founded in 2006, the current line-up consists of lead vocalist, guitarist and keyboardist Matteo Musolino, bassist and vocalist Marco Musolino, guitarist and vocalist Claudio Conci and drummer Simone Radaelli.

From 2006 to 2009 the band was primarily focused on touring small clubs in north Italy.

The band recorded a Demo-cd titled Heavy Metal Lovers in February 2010, containing three original songs, showing classic hard rock/NWOBHM influences.

In 2012 they record a 25-minute long
